Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Kodwa Samphosela elunxwemeni egula enjalo
Ke kaloku Sahlumisa umthi womhlavuthwa phezu kwakhe (ngentla kwakhe)
Kananjalo Samthumela kubantu abangamawaka aliwaka nangaphezulu kunoko
Bakholwa ke; Saza Sabanika ulonwabo lokwethutyana
Ngoku ke khawubabuze (Muhammad): “Ingaba ziintombi5 (zodwa) na Enazo iNkosi yakho baze bona babe noonyana na?”
Okanye	mhlawumbi	(bathi)	Sadala	iingelosi	zaba ngabasetyhini lo gama babebukele bona kusini na
Inene kungobuxoki babo le nto abahedeni besithi
“UAllâh Uzele”, bona ngamaxoki okwenene
Ingaba Yena Uzikhethele iintombi kusini na endaweni yoonyana
Yintoni na ngani? Nigweba njani kanye
Kanti aniqaphelisisi na
Okanye mhlawumbi ninegunya elicacileyo nina
Yizani nencwadi yenu kaloku ukuba ninenyaniso
Kananjalo baye baqamba ukuhlobana phakathi kwaKhe neeJinni, kodwa zona iiJinni ziyazi (kakuhle) okokuba ziza kuma (phambi kwaKhe ziphendule ngezenzo zazo)
Uzuko	lonke	malube	kuAllâh!	(Okude	lee)	koko bakwayamanisa naYe
Ngaphandle kwezicaka zika-Allâh, Awazikhethayo
Ngoko ke inene nina bahedeni ndawonye nabo nibanqulayo (izinyanya)
Abangekhe balahlekise (nabani na kumakholwa) bamwexule kuYe (uAllâh)
Ngaphandle kwalowo umiselwe ukuba atshe esiHogweni
Yaye akukho namnye kuthi (ingelosi) koko unendawo yakhe eyaziwayo
Kananjalo thina (zingelosi) sima ngokwemigca (sithandaze phambi koAllah)
Yaye futhi thina (zingelosi) inene singabo bazukisa uAllâh
Kananjalo bona (abahedeni) babedla ngokuthi
“Ukuba sasibe naye umlumkisi njengabantu bamandulo
Sasiya kuba zizicaka zika-Allâh ezikhethiweyo
Kodwa (ngoku i’Kur’ân ifikile) abakholwa kuyo. Ngoko ke baza kwazi
Inene lona ilizwi leThu sele liphumile, kwamandulo mayela neziCaka zeThu abaProfeti
Elokuba ngabo ngokwenene abaza kuba noloyiso
Kwanokuba imikhosi yeThu yiyo eza kuba yeyoyisayo
Shenxa ke kubo (wena Muhammad) okwethutyana
Ubajonge yaye baza kusibona (isohlwayo)
Ingaba bafuna ukuba isohlwayo sikhawuleziswe
Ke kaloku ukuhla kwaso singena emizini yabo, iya kuba mbi intsasa (yaloo mini) kwabo babelunyukisiwe
Ngoko ke (wena Muhammad) bashiye okwethutyana
Ubajonge, yaye baza kubona (isohlwayo)
Uzuko lonke malube seNkosini yakho, iNkosi yobunganga namandla (Ekude lee) koko bakwayamanisa naYo
Uxolo malube kubaThunywa
Neendumiso zonke mazibe kuAllâh, iNkosi uMlondolozi wamazwe
Sâd. Nge’Kur’ân enenkumbuzo
Nakanye abo bangakholwayo basekuphikiseni okuyinkukhumalo yobuxoki
Zingaphi izizukulwana eSazitshabalalisayo ngaphambili kunabo! Ke kaloku zakhala kwaba kungasekho xesha lakubaleka
Kananjalo (ama-Arabhu angakholwayo) amangalisekile kukuba kufike uMlumkisi kuwo ephuma phakathi kwawo. Yaye abangakholwayo bathi: “Lo (Mprofeti uMuhammad) ngumenzi wemilingo, ixoki
Ingaba udibanise oothixo bonke baba nguthixo omnye? Inene, yinto engummangaliso le
Ke kaloku abaziinkokeli phakathi kwabo bahamba besithi: “Nina hlalani nibambelele koothixo benu! Inene le yinto equlunqwe (ngokuchasene nani)
Asizanga siyive into (enjengale) kwinkolo yale mihla (ubuKhristu), asintoyimbilengaphandlekokubangumqambo
Ingaba iNkumbuzo1 ityhilwe kuye (yedwa) phakathi kwethu?” Unotshe, eneneni bona basezintandabuzweni ngeNkumbuzo yaM! Nakanye, abakasingcamli isohlwayo (saM)
Makube mhlawumbi banoovimba benceba yeNkosi yakho, uSomandla, uMboneleli wokwenene
Okanye mhlawumbi ulongamelo lwamazulu nomhlaba nako konke okuphakathi kuwo lolwabo? Ukuba kunjalo ke mabanyuke kaloku (beze emazulwini) ngeendlela (zabo)
Baya kuba ngumkhosi owoyisiweyo njengemikhosi yobumbano yamandulo (eyoyiswayo)
Phambi kwabo (baninzi) abaphikisa (abathunywa) abantu bakwaNûh nabakwa’Ad; nabakwaFir’awn umfo wezibonda (awayesohlwaya ngazo abantu)
NabakwaThamûd nabantu bakwaLût nabemi baseziNkunini abo ke yayingabantu bobumbano
Akukho namnye kubo ongazanga abaphike abaThunywa. Ngoko ke isohlwayo saM sathetheleleka
Aba ke balindele isithonga esinye kuphela seXilongo akuyi kubakho kuthotha nasiphelo kuso
Bathi: “Nkosi yethu! Khawulezisa (Usinike iiNcwadi zezenzo zethu ezilungileyo nezigwenxa ukuze sizibone) ingekafiki iMini yamatyala
Yibanomondewena(Muhammad) mayelanokobakuthethayo, ukhumbule kananjalo isiCaka seThu uDâwûd wanyamezela ngamandla. Inene yena wayehlala ebuyela (kuThi) ngezinto zonke (awayezenza), enenguquko
Senza iintaba ukuba zizukise iindumiso zeThu kunye naye (uDâwûd) emva kwemini nasekuphumeni kwelanga kude kube semini emaqanda
Zenza njalo neentaka zahlangana, zamthobela zonke (uDâwûd)
Senza ubukumkani bakhe baba namandla Samnika ubulumko nokugweba ngokulungileyo ngentetho nangokuthabatha isigqibo
